'''Kuki Shinobu''' {{Lang|ja=久岐忍}} is a playable [[Electro]] character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is the sidekick of [[Arataki Itto]] and Deputy Leader of the [[Arataki Gang]].<ref>HoYoLAB, Arataki Itto's official introduction: [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/1192135 Oni of Hanamizaka with a bold heroic spirit]</ref>
